unit.comment: // SuiteSparse:GraphBLAS, Timothy A. Davis, (c) 2017-2022, All Rights Reserved.
// x = A (i,j), where i and j are zero-based. If i and j arrays, then
// x (k) = A (i (k), j (k)) is done for all k.
unit.cpp:define: #define USAGE "x = GB_mex_Matrix_extractElement (A, I, J, xtype, use_scalar)"

function.name: mexFunction
function.parameter_list: ( int nargout, mxArray *pargout [ ], int nargin, const mxArray *pargin [ ] )
